recipe.title: Mini Pear Puddings
recipe.step: Grease a 12 muffin tray and set aside.
Mix sugar and flour in a large bowl.
Peel and cut up pears into small pieces (dont use the core.)
Mix the milk melted butter and vanilla into the dry ingredients.
Place heap TBspoon each muffin hole and distribute until all used up.
Cook for 20 minutes or until golden on top.
Serve hot with passionfruit juice poured on top.
Refrigerate both juice and remaining puddings up to a week.
